detaileddescription.para: current state of an GSSAPI authentication

memberdef.argsstring: (int verb, const char *msg, int maj_stat, int min_stat)
memberdef.name: ssh_gssapi_log_error

briefdescription.para: Set the forwadable ticket to be given to the server for authentication. Unlike ssh_gssapi_get_creds() this is called on the client side of an ssh connection.
returns the OIDs of the mechs that have usable credentials

simplesect.para: SSH_AUTH_ERROR: A serious error happened SSH_AUTH_DENIED: Authentication failed : use another method SSH_AUTH_AGAIN: In nonblocking mode, you've got to call this again later.
